long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortless WordPress Admin Access - Anytime, Anywhere

Are you tired of remembering and typing in your custom WordPress admin URLs? Do you often find yourself on your own site, realizing you need to make a quick update, but dread the hassle of navigating to your hidden admin page?

Introducing our new Chrome extension, designed to streamline your WordPress management experience. With our extension, you can seamlessly access your WordPress back office with just a double-shift keypress, saving you valuable time and effort.

Here’s how it works:

Instant Access: Whether you're browsing any of your sites, you can instantly jump to your WordPress admin login page without the hassle of typing URLs. For instance, from https://www.mysite.com/mypage, simply double-shift to be redirected to your custom admin URL like https://www.mysite.com/myhiddenadmin/?redirect_to=mypage.

Custom Admin URLs: Our extension recognizes your unique admin URLs, keeping your site secure and your workflow efficient. No more default wp-admin paths; use your personalized paths like mysite.com/myhiddenadmin.

Time-Saving: On average, save 10-15 seconds per login attempt (if you remember your secret url). Those seconds add up to more productive minutes and hours over time.

Simplified Workflow: Perfect for busy professionals who manage multiple WordPress sites. Ensure you're always just a double-shift away from your admin dashboard, no matter where you are on your site.

Don't let URL navigation slow you down. Embrace simplicity and efficiency with our WordPress admin access extension and keep your focus on what matters most—your content.

Download now and experience the ease of effortless WordPress management!
